description.@value: 10 Dark, Deadly And Delicious Novels From 10 Of Today S Hottest Romantic Suspense Authors At A Low Introductory Price For A Limited Time There S Something For Everyone Who Picks Up This Red Hot Bundle Revenge Blood And Honor, 1 By Dana Delamar Mafia Don Enrico Lucchesi Struggles To Preserve A Fragile Truce With The Andretti Family But When Kate Andretti Flees From Her Abusive Husband, Enrico Won T Leave Her In Jeopardy Can He Save Her Without Reigniting The Bloody Feud Between The Families Double Finalist In The 2013 Booksellers Best Awards Cliffs Of Starsdale By Bestselling Author Tallulah Grace Starsdale, California Offers A Picturesque Setting With A Small Town Atmosphere It S Hard To Believe Anything Bad Could Happen In Such An Idyllic Place, But Chelsea Bates Finds That Evil Lurks Beneath The Surface Of Someone She Trusted, Someone She Loved Even In Starsdale, Life Is Not Always What It Seems Deadly Misconceptions An Award Winning Story By And Barnes Nobel Bestselling Author Sandy Loyd When Former Runaway Lucy Maddox S Mentor Goes Missing, The PI Risks Everything To Find Her She S Even Willing To Team Up With Nemesis Jack Finnegan, Who S Only Out To Prove His Boss Isn T Responsible For The Disappearance Their Chase To Solve The Mystery Quickly Becomes A Struggle To Stay Alive Shadow Of Perception Book 2, Core Shadow Trilogy By Kristine Mason After A Reporter Receives Threatening, Gruesome DVDs, She Turns To The Criminal Investigation Agency CORE For Help Only Her Former Lover Is Assigned The Case Now They Find Themselves Not Only Knee Deep In A Twisted Investigation, But Forced To Deal With Their Past And The Love They D Tried To Deny Haunted By Death By Death Series 2 By USA Today Bestselling Author Dale Mayer Anthropologist Meg Pearce S Life Hasn T Been The Same Since Her Friend Disappeared Seventeen Years Ago She Lost Everything Then Including Detective Chad Ingram Now He S Back And Together They Are Looking To Solve The Mystery Only Death Isn T Done Shaking Up Their Lives And This Time They Are In The Crossfire Blind Her With Bliss Dangerous Affairs Series 1 By USA Today Bestselling Author Nina Pierce Investigating The Death Of Her Best Friend, Uptight Accountant, JULIE TILLING, Discovers A World Of Adult Nightclubs And Internet Intrigue When Shock Jock DAMON COREY Rocks Her World In A Wild Night Of Lust, She Wonders If She S Found Loveor The Key To Solving A Murder Love Deception Agents In Love 1 By Chantel Rhondeau Secret Agent Nick Kendall Is Infiltrating A Suspected Terrorist Organization The Problem He S Falling Hopelessly In Love With Carlie Hollis, A Key Player Of The Group Soon He Receives New Orders Kill The Target Will He Follow Those Orders Or Become Hunted Himself The Last Witness By Bestselling Author K.T Roberts NYPD Detectives Tate Kensington And Zachary Gerard Are Convinced One Killer Is At Work, But Proving It Seems An Impossible Feat Until A Pre Teen Prank Blows The Case Wide Open Can The Pair Put Away A Killer On A Paper Thin Case Or Will Their Disappearing Jane Doe Prove To BeTHE LAST WITNESS Shrouded In Darkness Shrouded In Darkness 1 By Multi Award Winning Author H D Thomson If Jake Preston Doesn T Stumble Upon A Miracle, He Ll End Up Dead And Even If He Does, He Still Might End Up Dead With A Clever Killer Hounding His Heels He Believes The Key To Reversing An Experiment That Is Killing Him Is Locked Away In Margot Davenport S Home. Subject book anthology review Killer RomanceI received this book from the authors and from Paranormal Romance and Authors that Rock This anthology contains 10 full length novels of romantic suspense The romance ranges from erotic to sweet, while the suspense runs the gamut of fearful emotions The stories are all easy to get lost in All of the mysteries will keep you guessing and the HEAs abound Review RevengeKate Andretti is married to a nephew of a mob boss, yet is unaware of this fact After a separation she meets a mob don, Enrique, yet is still unaware of his mob life This novel has romance, mob action and suspense The novel starts off running and other than Kate vacillating with her new love, which is annoying, the story is an exciting ride.Review Cliffs of StarsdaleA young woman, Chelsea, moves to a small town, buys a money pit and decides to renovate it to open a B B Meet John and Mac, her father and son contractors Together they create something beautiful Sounds too perfect Enter the ex, Preston He wants Chelsea back There are so many secrets in this story and one scary plot This small town and it s inhabitants suck you in and make this story flow There is evil around, though and the reader is kept to th Kristine Mason told me about this anthology and after checking it out, I thought, I have to have these I am reviewing Killer Romances as a bundle, but will rate them separately on Goodreads.I had read Kristine Mason s 5 Star novel, Shadow of Perception Book II of the Core Shadow Trilogy some time ago and loved it If the rest of the books are anything like hers, this is going to be a huge hit I was not disappointed.Killer Romances has all the elements thrillers need to make us squirm.The novels are varied.We have the mob, serial killers and secret agents.We have romantic suspense and murder mystery galore.We travel from the city to the wilderness.I started reading on September 2 and finished in the wee hours of the morning on Septmber 18, 2014.Killer Romances had me on the edge of my seat for 16 days.I couldn t stop reading.I read one right after the other.My eyes are burning and ready to pop out of my head 8 I was surprised at how many times cancer was mentioned in the beginning novels, not that there s anything wrong with that A little humor there If you have ever watched Seinfeld on TV, you will know what I mean.If you love mystery, romance, sex, suspense, thrillers and science fiction, this fantastic anthology is for you.There is loss, love, loyalty, betrayal, brutality, sorrow, tragedy, arrogance, ego no mercy.I loved, I hated.I wept, I laughed.I kicked ass, I killed.My favorite is Shadow of Perception by Kristine Mason I was a huge fan o Ten full length Romantic Suspense Novels in one bundle They all are so good I especially liked Cliffs of Starsdale by Tallulah Grace It was well plotted with great suspense I wanted to beat up Preston That is how real the characters were Blinded by Bliss by Nina Pierce Very good with hot sizzle between the characters I was never sure who dun it I was surprised by the ending Love and Deception by Chantel Rhondeau Lots of twists and turns I really liked t Ten full length Romantic Suspense Novels in one bundle They all are so good I especially liked Cliffs of Starsdale by Tallulah Grace It was well plotted with great suspense I wanted to beat up Preston That is how real the characters were Blinded by Bliss by Nina Pierce Very good with hot sizzle between the characters I was never sure who dun it I was surprised by the ending Love and Deception by Chantel Rhondeau Lots of twists and turns I really liked the characters I was gi I picked up this anthology because two authors that I love had books in it I knew that Dale Mayer and Tallulah Grace would contribute outstanding stories to the collection, and in fact, their books are my favorites There are some books that were not to my taste but the writing was still excellent and most readers wou FantasticWow I think this box set was.99 it was well worth it and  This set had everything, serial killers, missing witness, revenge killing, crazy stalker boyfriend, a hitman sent to kill an innocent woman,on top of all of that there were some super hot heroes and sizzling sex. 10 Amazing Author with 10 Amazing and exciting books I read until I couldn t see literally doing a marathon with these amazing books Each one was as exciting and intriguing as the next It was thrilling What was even better was getting them all in  Was enjoying the book.I was enjoying the book but I was unable to get past 3% Every time I tried to get to the next page I would get before you go rate the book Very disappointed. Purchased this collection to read Shadow of Perception Book 2, Core Shadow Trilogy by Kristine Mason, since it had lower price than buying the separate book.
